concept.title: What is a Pin?
concept.shortdesc: Pins are short passwords that are linked to your library card number.

conbody.p: Library card pins function similarly to a debit card pin. The pin protects your account by ensuring that only you, the cardholder, are the one using your card to access library services.
You can use any combination of letters and/or numbers, but cannot exceed 10 characters.
Be sure your chosen pin is a combination you will remember. You will need to input it when:
